meanings.sent1: I enjoy outsitting on the porch in the evenings.
meanings.sent2: The cat was outsitting on the fence, watching the birds.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was outsitting on the tree branch, pretending to be a statue.
meanings.sent4: The idea of outsitting the city lights filled her with peace.
meanings.sent5: Outsitting under the stars, he felt a sense of freedom and tranquility.

meanings.definition: The act of sitting outside or beyond.
meanings.sent1: Outsitting can be refreshing on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: We found a cozy spot for outsitting by the river.
meanings.sent3: The outsitting area in the park was always occupied by families enjoying picnics.
meanings.sent4: The outsitting of the children on the playground brought smiles to the parents' faces.
meanings.sent5: The outsitting of the old man on the bench seemed like a peaceful moment frozen in time.
